div.p: >>> HI I’M BILL O’REILLY. THANKS FOR WATCHING US
TONIGHT. THE EXPLOITATION OF IT.

SYMBOL OF FREEDOM ALL OVER THE WORLD.

PEOPLE DOWN THAT WAS CALLED
APARTHEID.
NELSON MANDELA LED THE FIGHT FOR CIVIL RIGHTS IN HIS

FOR TRYING TO GET EQUALITY FOR ALL SOUTH

OPPRESSION IT WAS A VERY DIFFICULT TASK.

STANDS. AND SOUTH AFRICANS WERE
